level.heading: Establishment of the Wilson Building Foundation.

level.text: There is established in the District of Columbia the John A. Wilson Building Foundation ("Foundation"), a private-public nonprofit corporation.
The purposes of the Foundation are:
To develop a long-range plan for the use of the Wilson Building by the District government and by the public; and
To develop and implement a fundraising plan to pay for the renovation and restoration of the Wilson Building.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 10-1331.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-180, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 10-1331.
